articles.title: Tentative tech bounce as investors escape bonds - Reuters.com
articles.description: Asian equities hit three week highs on Wednesday as investors fled a meltdown in bond markets and sought refuge in cash, carry trades and beaten-down sectors such as technology, while the Ukraine conflict's threat to supplies kept oil prices firm.
